title: One Prompt Site Home Page
creator: griffin
prompt:
Create a homepage for a project called "OnePromptSite" — a visually striking, modern directory that showcases websites created from a single AI prompt.

The purpose of this site is to demonstrate what is possible using AI to build entire sites from one prompt alone. It should feel cutting-edge, a little magical, and inspiring for creative technologists or curious onlookers. Let your design system shine — bold layout, clean UI, and playful touches are welcome.

Use the following JSON as the data source:
 - - REDACTED - - 

Each entry includes:

* title
* url
* previewImage (optional)
* creator
* prompt
* createdAt (ISO date)
* notes (optional)

For each site card:

* Show a screenshot preview using the `previewImage` URL if present.
* If missing, show a styled fallback visual block:

  * Include a clean, softly colored background
  * Bold title centered
  * Label like “Preview Not Available” or a clean SVG icon

Display the following details:

* Title (clickable, opens in new tab)
* Creator name
* Date created (formatted like "May 12, 2025")
* A dropdown or toggle section labeled "View Prompt" that expands to reveal the full prompt

  * Prompt should be displayed using <pre> or similar block that preserves all special characters, line breaks, and dashes
  * Include a “Copy Prompt” button inside the expanded section
* Only show `notes` if present

Design instructions:

* Typography should be beautiful, readable, and modern
* Responsive grid that feels good on both mobile and desktop
* Let spacing, color, and hierarchy create flow
* Don’t over-constrain layout — use modern patterns and nice touches like hover effects or animated expands

At the top of the page:

* Site title: "OnePromptSite"
* Tagline: "Exploring what’s possible with a single prompt."

Footer:

* Centered message: “Built with AI · One prompt at a time”

Include:

* Favicon
* SEO metadata (title: OnePromptSite, description: A growing archive of websites built with one prompt alone.)

Avoid including any contact forms or editing tools. This is a public-facing gallery powered entirely by the JSON feed.
notes:
